==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|せい|ぶん|yomi=on}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=せいぶん}} compound {{m|zh|成文|tr=dzyeng mjun|lit=to complete + writing}}. [[漢音#Japanese|Kan'on]] reading, so probably a later borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|せいぶん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|せいぶん}}

# [[written]] [[material]], [[writing]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|成文化|せいぶんか}}: [[codification]], putting something into [[writing]]; to [[codify]], to put into [[writing]]
* {{ja-r|成文憲法|せいぶん けんぽう}}: a [[written]] [[constitution]]
* {{ja-r|成文法|せいぶんほう}}: a [[written]] [[law]]
* {{ja-r|成文律|せいぶんりつ}}: a [[written]] [[law]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なり|ふみ|k2=ぶみ|r=y}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=なりぶみ|成り|tr1=nari|t1=becoming|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|成る}} ''naru'' “to become”|文|tr2=fumi|t2=writing, document}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> {{rendaku2|sort=なりぶみ|fumi|bumi}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|なりぶみ}}
